newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Ipmuda to distribute Perwaja products.
newsitem.headline: Ipmuda to distribute Perwaja products.

text.p: Ipmuda Bhd said that it has entered into a sole distributor agreement with unlisted Perwaja Steel Sdn Bhd to distribute Perwaja's products.

In a statement sent to the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange late on Wednesday, Ipmuda said the agreement is effective from June 1 and will continue for five years with an extension of five more years unless terminated by either firm.
The products made by Perwaja include reinforcement bars, wire rods, wire mesh, nails and structural sections.
Terms of the agreement were not disclosed.
Ipmuda is a building materials and hardware products trading firm. Its stock was suspended on April 16 and was requoted on Friday. It traded down five cents to 6.20 ringgit at 0228 GMT.

Perwaja, a state-owned insolvent steel maker, was found last year to have accumulated losses of 2.9 billion ringgit. Its previous government-appointed managers were investigated for financial mismanagement.
